TopicTitle: Remote Control Modules Showing a Facecam of the Ground Control Crew

Articles.Content: As the title says, when using the remote control module(s) as the only means of control, a reaction shot of the ground control crew should be shown in place of the regular kerbalnauts. They should also be frustrated instead of scared whenever the craft starts to move uncontrollably.
Sounds like a good idea... but i don't know... i don't think this is a high priority right now.

Nice Idea, there is a remote control Mod wich is worth trying. And i suggest that there should be no regular cameras available just prefixed ones on the vessel, and you can watch them on a big monitor in the Mission Control. And the remote Signals shuld have a delay.

Why not have a whole new career section for selecting Flight control Kerbals?

Not only for remote missions but for manned ones aswell.

Kerbalnauts and Kerbin Mission Control working together?

Lets face it, where dose it stop!!??
So having a camera for the ground control kerbs? cool.
